tasks.label: Compile PlayerWeaponShop
tasks.command: javac -d bin -sourcepath src -cp "c:\Program Files (x86)\Fractal Softworks\Starsector\starsector-core\*" src/playerweaponshop/*.java
tasks.detail: Compile Java source files into the bin directory.

tasks.label: Create PlayerWeaponShop JAR
tasks.detail: Delete existing JAR (if any) and create a new one in the jars directory.

tasks.label: Compile and Package PlayerWeaponShop
tasks.command: javac -d bin -sourcepath src -cp "c:\Program Files (x86)\Fractal Softworks\Starsector\starsector-core\*" src\playerweaponshop\*.java && jar cvf jars\PlayerWeaponShop.jar -C bin . && "C:\Program Files\WinRAR\Rar.exe" a -r ..\PlayerWeaponShop.rar ./**
tasks.detail: Compile Java source files into the bin directory, create a JAR, and then package it into a RAR file placed in the parent directory.
